dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.text: Hello there! Are you new to town?

dialogue.speaker: John
dialogue.text: Yes, I just moved here. How could you tell?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.text: Just a hunch. Plus, I've never seen you around. Welcome to our little village!

dialogue.speaker: John
dialogue.text: Thank you for your warm welcome, Anna. I'm glad to be here.
